title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message:
I have 2915 board with H5GQ2H24MFR and want to put H5GQ1H24AFR
I realized that I will cut the vram from 1GB to 512MB but at this moment I havenot got another vram.
Should I move some resistor?

title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message: No, don't mess with this and get the correct chips. Also these chips never die and usually just require reflow/reball.

title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message: What about samsung? Also only reflow or reball or they die more?

title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message: No VRAM on these boards have known issues. Sure they can die, but it is not common.

title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message: In practice it is possible to convert a board from 0005 1GB to 9000 256MB with 2 vram only? Comparing boards and changing the resistors is enoght?

title: Want to replace H5GQ2H24MFR
message: Yes, but why? Both chips are nowhere to be found.
